text: Mass Effect 3 is a video game on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. It is made by Electronic Arts. It is the sequel to Mass Effect 2. It is a action role- playing game. It is a third-person shooter game. ==Gameplay== Save data from the second game can be used to influence choices made in this game. ==Reception== The game was liked, except for its divisive ending. ==Other websites== * Category:2012 video games Category:Mass Effect Category:BioWare games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Action role-playing video games Category:Cooperative video games Category:LGBT-related video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Role-playing video games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games set in Vancouver Category:Wii U games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Mass Effect 3
